column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2022
column14: The product that was shipped it Dial Hair and Body, not the newer 3 in 1 product.  The formulas are not the same.  This is blatant misrepresentation of what was shipped.

column6: Great 2 in 1 body wash that leaves a crisp clean scent. Will buy again
column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2020
column14: This is a great two in one body wash. The scent is great and very strong while using it but then fades out nicely.  I use this product with my Axe Detailer and a little goes a long way with this body wash. I have no complaints about it as it does what it's intended to do and the price is right. I will continue to keep this in my Subscribe and Save queue for as long as it is available

column6: Was sent "old" 2 in 1 version, not "new" 3 in 1 version.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2021
column14: Ordered new formula version of Dial Ultimate Clean (3 in 1 body, hair and face) but received the old version (body and hair), which is a 2 in 1 version).  Have used the old version for years, but ordered this one since it specified 3 in 1.  Disappointed that I was shipped the older version.  I understand the desire to ship the oldest stock first.  But, don't send a different version.  My rating is based on that fact.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
column14: Most soap products are so over priced. This purchase was a very good choice. Trusted brand, great pricing pack of 4. As described. Will buy again.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
column14: I'm pleased with this purchase - plenty concentrated so that I only use a little, good smelling, seems to clean well.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020
column14: The thickness of the soap is just right for me.  I also enjoy having one bottle of soap for cleaning the body and shampoo for the hair. Also, a reasonable price. Thanks, Glen E. Dowdy

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2021
column14: smells great and does a good job cleaning leaves you feeling clean.

column14: Body soap / shampoo, works like all the others
